name: VR-Drone Pizza Delivery Free
description:
It's time to deliver a yummy pizza and get a real fun simulation with vr navigation of drone flight.
A free vr game for pizza lovers. A vr pizza delivery game with new and more exciting fun. No more delivery on bike and other cars. Now deliver your pizza with drone flight and simulate your driving experience with this new vehicle and get into a real city environment by wearing vr glasses. VR glasses gives you a real effect of simulating. So drive drone with vr and taste a real and exciting flavour of pizza with vr drone drive. Your duty is to pick a pizza from a pizza shop and deliver it to a destination. Drive safe when you experience vr drone flight. Avoid to hit with a city buildings and crash down. Deliver your pizza on time with a simulation of vr drone flight.
Features
Variety of pizza delivery missions with vr drone flight. Real and thrilling sim of drone with pizza delivery. Stunning city environment with drone flight. A real fun of pizza drone driving. Stunning graphics with ocular navigation of vr.
